graphicshandler

Class SlideElementDuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicshandler.SlideElementDuration

  • public class SlideElementDuration
extends java.lang.Object
    SmartTrolley Handler for durations of media on a slide. uses timers to make the slide appear after startTime and then remain visible for the duration.
    Version:
    1.0 [Date Created: 25/04/14]
    Author:
    Matthew Wells, Alasdair Munday, [Checked By:] [Checker(s) fill here]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SlideElementDuration(javafx.scene.Node node)
      Method calls setVisible(false) such that node does not appear

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDuration(int milliseconds)
      Set the time for which node should remain visible
      void setStartTime(int milliseconds)
      Set the time after which node should appear
      void show()
      Method instantiates a timer used to count the delay set by startTime.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show()
        Method instantiates a timer used to count the delay set by startTime. If duration is set to 0, node will always be visible
